name: Astral Dispatch
description:
Astral Dispatch is a game made for the 11th mini Jame Gam!

In Astral Dispatch  you'll play as a delivery driver, who has no respect for his space ship, slashing and ramming your way through enemies to deliver your containers to their selected planets on time!

Controls Are As Follows
  • w, a ,s, d   /   arrow keys  -  movement!
  • E to dash! - 0.5 second cooldown
  • Q to use your special ability! - 8 second cooldown
Objective / Tutorial!

Your objective is to deliver packages to planets after defeating a wave of enemies! After you killed said wave of enemies a white pointer should appear directing you to the planet you are supposed to deliver the package to, else if the timer ran out should re-direct you to the depot station so you could pick up a new package!
